args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
# Sequential compactness implies compactness in metric spaces

We state: if every sequence in a metric space `Î±` has a convergent subsequence
(i.e. for all `u : â„• â†’ Î±` there exists a strictly monotone `Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•` and `x : Î±`
such that `tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) at_top (ğ“ x)`), then `Î±` is a `CompactSpace`.
-/

theorem metric_space_sequentially_compact_implies_compact_space {Î± : Type _} [MetricSpace Î±]
  (h : âˆ€ u : â„• â†’ Î±, âˆƒ Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•, StrictMono Ï† âˆ§ âˆƒ x : Î±, Tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) at_top (ğ“ x)) :
  CompactSpace Î± := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
# Sequential compactness implies compactness in metric spaces

We state: if every sequence in a metric space `Î±` has a convergent subsequence

such that `Tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) atTop (ğ“ x)`), then `Î±` is a `CompactSpace`.
-/

theorem metric_space_sequentially_compact_implies_compact_space {Î± : Type _} [MetricSpace Î±]
  (h : âˆ€ u : â„• â†’ Î±, âˆƒ Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•, StrictMono Ï† âˆ§ âˆƒ x : Î±, Tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) atTop (ğ“ x)) :
  CompactSpace Î± := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
# Sequential compactness implies compactness in metric spaces

If every sequence in a metric space `Î±` has a convergent subsequence
(i.e. for all `u : â„• â†’ Î±` there exists a strictly monotone `Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•` and `x : Î±`
such that `Tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) Filter.atTop (nhds x)`), then `Î±` is a `CompactSpace`.
-/

theorem metric_space_sequentially_compact_implies_compact_space {Î± : Type _} [MetricSpace Î±]
  (h : âˆ€ u : â„• â†’ Î±, âˆƒ Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•, StrictMono Ï† âˆ§ âˆƒ x : Î±, Tendsto (u âˆ˜ Ï†) Filter.atTop (nhds x)) :
  CompactSpace Î± := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
# Sequential compactness implies compactness in metric spaces

If every sequence in a metric space `Î±` has a convergent subsequence
(i.e. for all `u : â„• â†’ Î±` there exists a strictly monotone `Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•` and `x : Î±`
such that for all `Îµ > 0` there is `N` with `âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, dist (u (Ï† n)) x < Îµ`), then `Î±` is a `CompactSpace`.
-/

theorem metric_space_sequentially_compact_implies_compact_space {Î± : Type _} [MetricSpace Î±]
  (h : âˆ€ u : â„• â†’ Î±, âˆƒ Ï† : â„• â†’ â„•, StrictMono Ï† âˆ§ âˆƒ x : Î±, âˆ€ Îµ > (0 : â„), âˆƒ N : â„•, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, dist (u (Ï† n)) x < Îµ) :
  CompactSpace Î± := by sorry
